president.title: Message from the CEO
president.name: Rojo Claudino Andrianasolo
paragraphs: ‚ÄúAfrica is rich in talent, ideas, and resources. What it needs today is an ecosystem capable of structuring this wealth, nurturing it, and connecting it to real opportunities. That is where Gate Africa Group comes in.‚Äù

Our mission is clear: to support the continent‚Äôs transformation sector by sector, with education, technology, health, agriculture, media, economic development, and innovation at the heart of our strategy.
Based in Madagascar and Mauritius and expanding internationally, our group serves as a bridge between African expertise and global markets, while remaining deeply rooted in local realities.

Through our universities, digital platforms, pan-African events, agribusiness projects, initiatives in health, tourism, business development, and recruitment, we believe in a strong, autonomous, and connected Africa.

And because we lead with heart, we place people at the center of our commitment. Through our NGO, Gate Africa Humanitarian, we work alongside communities to support children's education, fight childhood cancer, protect the environment, prevent gender-based violence, and assist the most vulnerable.
Developing Africa also means helping others grow.
Gate Africa Group is not just a multisectoral group. It is a vision, a mechanism for impact, and a constant drive to build tomorrow‚Äôs Africa with method, confidence, and boldness.
‚ÄúDevelopment is not a promise, it is a construction. And we are laying the foundations.‚Äù

university.title: Education and Higher Learning Segment
university.synergy: Thanks to this synergy, we train talents who are immediately operational and perfectly adapted to the needs of businesses and institutions.

sectionHeader.text1: Our strength lies in the strategic complementarity of our three university centers.
sectionHeader.text2: Each institution brings targeted expertise ‚Äî advanced technologies, strategic management, and creative industries ‚Äî covering all essential skills to support Africa's major economic transformations.

tourism.subtagline: facilitating patient access to the best medical facilities.

tourism.region: in Africa, Mauritius, India, and Europe.

sophys.title: Sophys
sophys.subtitle: ‚Äî Hygiene, Cleanliness & Sanitary Solutions
sophys.paragraph1: Sophys is Gate Africa Group‚Äôs specialized subsidiary in professional hygiene, industrial cleaning, disinfection, and comprehensive sanitary solutions.
sophys.paragraph2: Beyond standard cleaning services, Sophys also develops its own product lines for cleaning and disinfection, including the VIRUSTOP brand, ensuring end-to-end control of quality and safety standards for its clients.

landmark.title: Landm'Ark
landmark.subtitle: Communication, Marketing & Event Management
landmark.description1: is Gate Africa Group‚Äôs specialized subsidiary in strategic communication, marketing, and high-value event management.
landmark.description2: Combining creativity, technical expertise, and a field-driven approach, Landm'Ark supports companies and institutions in designing and implementing their communication, visibility, and branding strategies across Africa and beyond.

description3.before: Thanks to its experienced teams, professional equipment, and international network, Landm'Ark offers
description3.after: that are innovative and tailored to the needs of both public and private sector players.

agribusiness.title: Gate Africa Agribusiness
agribusiness.description: Gate Africa Agribusiness is the agricultural and agro-industrial branch of Gate Africa Group, committed to developing strategic agricultural value chains in production, processing, and enhancement.
agribusiness.subdescription1: Our approach integrates the entire value chain, from production to commercialization, promoting sustainable models, technological innovation, and agro-entrepreneurship.
agribusiness.subdescription2: Gate Africa Agribusiness actively contributes to food sovereignty, local job creation, and sustainable economic development, positioning agriculture as a true driver of growth in Africa.

internationnal.title: Event Division
internationnal.intro: Creating platforms for connection, innovation, and influence at both the African and global level. Gate Africa Group designs and organizes high-impact events that connect talents, businesses, institutions, and changemakers across Africa and beyond.
internationnal.missionText: Our events aim to strengthen synergies between strategic sectors, promote cooperation, and accelerate economic development.

footer.aboutText: Together, let's empower the future of Africa! Join Gate Africa Group to transform lives through education, healthcare, and innovation for a brighter tomorrow.
